code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import ChatBox from'./components/ChatBox';import ChatInput from'./components/ChatInput';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import Navbar from'./components/Navbar';import AboutUs from'./components/AboutUs';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Chat(){const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[isVisible,setIsVisible]=useState(true);const addMessage=(message,sender)=>{setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,{text:message,sender,feedback:''}]);};const addFeedback=(index,feedback)=>{setMessages(prevMessages=>prevMessages.map((msg,i)=>i===index?{...msg,feedback}:msg));};const handleSendClick=()=>{setIsVisible(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u0D1C\u0D28 \u0D38\u0D39\u0D3E\u0D2F\u0D3F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/aboutus",className:"aboutus circle-link","data-hover":"About Us",children:"ABOUT US"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-container",children:[isVisible&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u0D0E\u0D28\u0D3F\u0D15\u0D4D\u0D15\u0D4D \u0D28\u0D3F\u0D19\u0D4D\u0D19\u0D33\u0D46 \u0D0E\u0D19\u0D4D\u0D19\u0D28\u0D46 \u0D38\u0D39\u0D3E\u0D2F\u0D3F\u0D15\u0D4D\u0D15\u0D3E\u0D28\u0D3E\u0D15\u0D41\u0D02?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatBox,{messages:messages,addFeedback:addFeedback}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChatInput,{addMessage:addMessage,onSend:handleSendClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{})]})]});}function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chat,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/aboutus",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AboutUs,{})})]})})});}export default App;
